fields.inlineHelpText: Set the start value. To determine if the rule is true, this value is compared to the Usage Field value.
fields.label: First Occurrence
fields.name: FirstOccurrence

fields.inlineHelpText: Set the frequency of maintenance. For example if this field is “1000”, this will schedule at every 1000 increments. This can either be a positive value for an incrementing Usage Field, or a negative value for a decreasing Usage Field.
fields.label: Frequency
fields.name: Frequency

fields.inlineHelpText: This field’s value is compared to the Usage Field to determine if the rule is true.
fields.label: Next Occurrence Field
fields.name: NextOccurrenceField

fields.inlineHelpText: Index in the Recordset Filter Criteria Rule
fields.label: Index
fields.name: Index

fields.inlineHelpText: This field stores the daily usage rate of the asset. The unit for the usage rate must be per day.
fields.label: Usage Rate Field
fields.name: UsageRateField

fields.inlineHelpText: This enum value that define different options for Usage Rate Field.
fields.label: Usage Rate Unit
fields.name: UsageRateUnit
